alert.note: Alert for Goochland; Hanover; Henrico (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 27 at 7:31PM EDT until May 27 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GOOCHLAND...NORTHWESTERN HENRICO AND WEST CENTRAL HANOVER COUNTIES... At 730 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Wyndham, or 8 miles northwest of Tuckahoe, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Montpelier around 740 PM EDT. Ashland around 750 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Rockville, Gilman, Johnsons Springs, Goodall, Elmont and Short Pump. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
